EmailTemplate.subject: Same Number - New Option (#3) - for Reaching Customer Service
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please Note: Same Number, New Option (#3) for Reaching Customer Service Customer Service: 800-987-0911 (option #3) Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
The TriTech Customer Service Team is moving to a single support phone number across the TriTech product line. It is the same phone number which you have been accustomed to using. However, please note that the options have changed; to reach technical support for the 911 Inc. software, you will need to press a different option after dialing into the toll-free number: 800-987-0911 (option #3).
Remember, you can reach TriTech Customer Service in three easy ways:
- By Phone: 800-987-0911 (option #3) - By email <mailto:911incsupport@tritech.com> - Through the Customer Service Center (support portal) on the TriTech <http://www.tritech.com/> website
Proudly serving our customers, TriTech Customer Service
